statements.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into Shop (GUID,Title,City,county,Area,Address,Phone,Line,BizType,BizCharacter,CapCount,Cost,Environment,ParkCount,RunDate,Website,map,Logo,Content,ShortContent,CREATOR,CREATE_DATE,Laste_update_date,Laste_update_By,QQ,aliww,Tag,Mobile,Status,ViewTimes,ShowPr) values (#Guid#,#Title#,#City#,#County#,#Area#,#Address#,#Phone#,#Line#,#Biztype#,#Bizcharacter#,#Capcount#,#Cost#,#Environment#,#Parkcount#,#Rundate#,#Website#,#Map#,#Logo#,#Content#,#Shortcontent#,#Creator#,#CreateDate#,#LasteUpdateDate#,#LasteUpdateBy#,#Qq#,#Aliww#,#Tag#,#Mobile#,#Status#,#Viewtimes#,#Showpr#)
statements.update: update Shop set GUID=#Guid# ,Title=#Title# ,City=#City# ,county=#County# ,Area=#Area# ,Address=#Address# ,Phone=#Phone# ,Line=#Line# ,BizType=#Biztype# ,BizCharacter=#Bizcharacter# ,CapCount=#Capcount# ,Cost=#Cost# ,Environment=#Environment# ,ParkCount=#Parkcount# ,RunDate=#Rundate# ,Website=#Website# ,map=#Map# ,Logo=#Logo# ,Content=#Content# ,ShortContent=#Shortcontent# ,CREATOR=#Creator# ,CREATE_DATE=#CreateDate# ,Laste_update_date=#LasteUpdateDate# ,Laste_update_By=#LasteUpdateBy# ,QQ=#Qq# ,aliww=#Aliww# ,Tag=#Tag# ,Mobile=#Mobile# ,Status=#Status# ,ViewTimes=#Viewtimes# ,ShowPr=#Showpr# where Seqno=#Seqno#
